hero.title: Helios, your AI Employee.
hero.description: Autonomous AI agents for your business. Instantly deploy, automate, and scale operations.

auth.signInDesc: Sign in to your account to continue

useCases.title: See Helios in action
useCases.desc: Explore real-world examples of how Helios completes complex tasks autonomously

openSource.title: 100% Open Source
openSource.desc: Helios is fully open source. Join our community and help shape the future of AI.
openSource.explore: Explore, contribute, or fork our repository. Helios is built with transparency and collaboration at its core.
openSource.trustDesc: We believe AI should be open and accessible to everyone. Our open source approach ensures accountability, innovation, and community collaboration.

pricing.title: General Intelligence available today
pricing.subtitle: You can self-host Helios or use our cloud for managed service.
pricing.selfHostedDesc: Deploy on your own infrastructure for maximum control and privacy.

footer.description: Helios by CloudOne â€“ is a generalist AI Agent that acts on your behalf.

enterpriseModal.title: Custom AI Employees for your Business
enterpriseModal.description: Create custom AI employees for your business based on your human employees data.
enterpriseModal.recordDesc: We record what employees do to understand their workflows and tasks.
enterpriseModal.trainDesc: AI is trained on the captured data to learn the tasks and decision-making.
enterpriseModal.automateDesc: AI agents automate tasks previously done by humans, with continuous learning and improvement.

agents.title: Your Agents
agents.description: Create and manage your AI agents
agents.noAgentsDesc: Create your first agent to start automating tasks and getting help from AI.
